block.p: WALLACE-Carol. Of Riverdale and Uniondale, New York, on May 24. Born Karola Lomnitz, on May 10, 1914, Mainstockheim, Germany, to Josef and Sophie Lomnitz. Beloved wife of Bert Wallace, mother of Vivian and John, grandmother of Benjamin, David and Michael. Services 10 AM, May 26, I.J. Morris Funeral Home, 21 East Deerpark, Dix Hills, New York. In lieu of flowers donations may be sent to Plainview Nursery School, 84 Southern Parkway, Plainview, New York 11803.
